original_title: Sri Lanka rupee close at Rs304/306 to US dollar, bond yields steady
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka rupee closed at 304/306 to the US dollar on Friday, dealers said, while bond yields were steady.
The Spot US dollar closed at 307.00/310.00 rupees on Thursday after interventions around 314 to the US dollar and moral suasion, market participants said.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 23.00/10 percent, steady from 23.00/20 percent a day earlier.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 closed at 24.90/25.10 percent, steady from the previous day’s close at 24.75/25.25 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2025 closed at 27.00/25 percent. steady from 27.00/75 percent.
A one-year bill closed at 17.00/18.00 percent, down from 18.25/19.00 percent at its last close. (Colombo/ June 17/2023)
